title: Restricted on gametype I can play?
body:
So after the game patched when I logged on tonight (seemed to do it after I logged in? Thought that was strange) I seem to be restricted to only being able to queue for either Blind Pick or ARAM.

Twisted Treeline shows as disabled, draft pick and both ranked queues cannot be selected for rift and have a blank textbox if moused over.

Any clue whats going on?

http://i.imgur.com/ZjUYMT9.png?noredirect

replies.body:
This is a visual bug that has been rarely occurring at the queue select screen. A quick restart of your client should resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions!

Restarted my client earlier, no luck, also decided to play through a whole aram.

Restarted the client after finishing the aram and the bug is still present.

Do you still see this issue if you launch into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know the results!
I launched using the Legacy Client and it's not restricted. I then reopened the new client after that and it seems to be fine now.
I am having the same problem, I can't host but I can join my friends games.
